## DistPath.jsAsync property

The output directory of async JavaScript files.

**Signature:**

```typescript
jsAsync?: string | undefined;
```

## Remarks

Default value:

- The `async` subdirectory of [DistPath.js](./rspeedy.distpath.js.md)<!-- -->.
